Pre-Game Insights: Sikandar Raza and brigade will be eager to grab a win for themselves to stay alive in the series.
Shubman Gill and Co will be fancying their chances to name the series to themselves with a win in the IND vs ZIM 4th T20I.
Zimbabwe's batting lineup is facing a lot of problems from the start of the series.
The order has been the problem as they are facing setting up against the lethal bowling attack of India.
After the win in the first match of the series, Zimbabwe bowlers have not carried their momentum.
They have tried to stop some runs but are not able to take wickets which eventually will build pressure on India.
Miscellaneous Highlights: As per the live weather report above, the weather during the IND vs ZIM 4th T20I 2024 will be crystal clear and there are no chances of any rain taking place.
The temperature during the time of IND vs ZIM 4th T20I 2024 will vary between 20-24 degrees Celsius.
The pitch at the Harare Sports Club is considered to be one of the best surfaces for playing cricket.
The surface has equal assistance for both batsmen and bowlers.
The pitch remains hard and has good bounce which helps the ball to come onto the bat well.
